Text: Morning! Cuomo went on CNN to trash Pres Trump. He said that POTUS's display was SHAMEFUL, holding up the Bible and praying at St.,Johns historic Church after it was torched! He attacked him for calling out the US military to help stop the violent rioters. Cuomo is insane! 🤦‍♀️

Trump isn't just trying to crack down on the protests for political gain and to make his base fear ‘Antifa' to further his authoritarian designs. He also, in fact and deed, completely supports what the protesters are fighting against, cops killing blacks. @realDonaldTrump

Trump loyalists roaming U.S. streets with bats and clubs, alongside the police looking for protestors and others to beat. #ICantBreathe #GeorgeFloyd #BlackLivesMatter #TrumpDictatorship https://t.co/Q85Ca0FnEA
Sorry Trump, waving a holy book doesn't save dictators from defeat.God doesn't smile down of evildoers.#TrumpDictatorship #DictatorTrump #Bible https://t.co/0IYTMjCvSu
I look forward to every "fact checker" in the media giving @JoeBiden 4 big Pinocchios for this whopper of a lie that he called for a nationwide lockdown in January.

These community organizers (students of Saul Alinsky), like Obama, Biden, Soros, Clinton, et al., have this down to a science now.They even pre-place bricks, medical supplies, and bail money, no kidding. They really do that.

Congress should immediately convene and pass a resolution condemning Trump's use of military force against peaceful protesters. Every Democrat and Republican needs to be on record.The Executive Branch is out of control. This is why Congress exists.

Democrat governor of PA (Tom Wolf) doesn't give me permission to go to my classroom to get materials to make my students graduation posters because of the dangers of COVID, but he supports Biden who has staff paying the bail of antifa members who are looting and destroying.🤷🏼‍♀️

I find it horrifying that after 3 1/2 years of racist, hateful bile, after Trump openly called for protestors to be shot in the streets by the military, "his tweets have not been helpful" is all Republicans can muster. You feckless cowards.

BIDEN: "This president today is part of the problem. When he tweeted the words 'when the looting starts, the shooting starts,' those weren't the words of a president — they were the words of a racist Miami police chief in the 1960s."
